summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: LXIANGN Nail Glass Cup With Lid Cute Dappen Dishes 2PCS Heart Shaped Bowl Glass Mini Crystal Bowls for Nail Art Manicure Care Tools Review Date: 2021/06/02 Store: LXIANGN Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {} Review Text: I personally love these dappen dishes!

Many complaints I’ve seen is that the lid doesn’t match the base. But as you can see from the photo, when the lid is on you can’t tell at all. I personally have no problem with them looking different when the lid is off.

The images for the product do look a lot larger then what the product actually is. I consider this a mini size. I absolutely love the size and I am glad it isn’t larger because it fits in my carry all perfectly.

It holds the liquids well and is very easy to clean. I didn’t have issues dipping my brushes into them or removing the access liquid.

I feel like these can even be used to hold all your stud earrings or something small.

Very satisfied with this product. Review Title: So cute Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6 Pack Hair Clips Review Date: 2021/06/10 Store: Cobahom Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cobahom', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: These leopard print duckbill clips are so adorable! They are a very pretty yellowish gold type metal and are very sturdy. I personally chose them because my mother loves leopard print and I plan on sending her the 3 lighter ones and I know she’ll love them.

These clips are very easy to use and add so much flare to your hair. I personally like wearing leopard print when I wear solid colors. Cute trick, leopard print goes with ANY color 😉 just don’t mix patterns and I promise it’ll be cute especially if it’s all solids !

They are very well made and I do not see these breaking anytime soon. Sorry I don’t have photos of them in my hair. Review Title: So lovely! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyebrow Tattoo Pen, Waterproof brow Pencil, Microblading Brow Pen, Natural Looking, Long Lasting (4# Dark Brown) Review Date: 2021/07/23 Store: EINHOOM Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.79 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: I did not like how this meshed with my brows. I’m not sure but it really did not look right. I did the upward strokes like my brow hairs but it really didn’t work well. Even when it’s overlapped like in my photo , it looks weird. I would not purchase this product nor recommend. Review Title: Big nope Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BQAN 2 Pieces Wax Pencil for Rhinestones, Dual-ended Rhinestone Picker Dotting Tool, Wax Pen for DIY Nail Art, Rhinestone Gems Crystals Studs Picker With Pink Acrylic Handle (Pink & Pink) Review Date: 2021/08/11 Store: BQAN Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 3.54 x 1.46 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '710050098918'} Review Text: I received 2 not 1 like everyone else. I have had no issues using it and it feels like a luxury brand. I’ve had no issues with the wax tip or breakage. I would recommend. Review Title: Very nice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: First Class Kit, International Travel, TSA Approved, Satin Eye Mask, Travel Pillowcase, Ear Plugs, Antibacterial Wipes, Travel Tissues, Perfect Overnight International Flights, Refreshed Traveler Review Date: 2021/10/28 Store: Travel Safety Kit Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.82 x 5.71 x 1.73 inches; 6.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '860001277357'} Review Text: This kit is AMAZING!! It has everything you’ll ever need to travel. Just pick it up and drop it in! I love the fact that it comes with a pillow case . That way you can use it at the hotel , take it home and wash it without any worries. The ear plugs are amazing. Love the eye mask! It’s such a cute kit it would make a great gift for anyone. Review Title: The best kit Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller,Jade Roller Set Facial Beauty Tools,Face Roller Skin Massager for Face Review Date: 2021/12/04 Store: Cuckoo Product Description: ['Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller& Jade Roller', 'Why choose Cuckoo?', 'Cuckoo has one pc of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller and one pc of Jade roller. The oil-absorbing volcanic face roller can help you absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times. The jade roller can improve skin circulation, soothes your skin, reducing puffiness, wrinkling and fine lines to smooth your skin.', 'Advantage Of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller', 'Prefect Oil Absorption Effect', 'Like oil-absorbing paper, but better.\xa0Roll through your face with volcanic stone balls to instantly absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times.', 'Reusable Use', 'Unlike blotting papers for oily skin that are used once and thrown out, this oil-absorbing roller is easy to clean make it reusable.', 'Special Design', 'Built-in special ball design, rolling is silkier and easier, gently or wherever the skin is shiny, rolling the face rollers.\xa0The oil on the face will disappear.', 'Easy To Carry', 'You don’t have to go rooting around your purse for blotting papers anymore.', 'Advantage Of Jade Roller', 'Natural Rose Quartz Jade', 'Natural approach to caring the skin, no dyes, sulfates, parabens or other chemicals. It is made of 100% natural Brazilian rose quartz jade stone.', 'No Crack& Scratch', "Use superb sanding technology to polish the surface of the jade many times. It is super fine and smooth so that don't scratch your skin.", 'Lifts and tighten skin& Improve the blood circulation& Smooth and reduce wrinkles& Reduces dark circles and puffiness'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.18 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Face Roller-1', 'Manufacturer': 'Cuckoo'} Review Text: For me it works amazingly. I really don’t like when I do my makeup and a little after start to feel oily. I use this and it refreshes my face and absorbs the oil. Review Title: Love it Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LordHighting 240 Pieces Halloween Party/ Ball Press on False Nails with Design, 12 Sizes Medium and Long Full Cover Gloss Fake Nails for Woman and Girls Review Date: 2021/12/09 Store: LordHighting Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'LordHighting', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Product Dimensions': '7.68 x 3.35 x 1.06 inches; 3.84 Ounces'} Review Text: I absolutely love this set. I decided to use the shorter set because at the time I needed my nails really short. I prepped my nails and used some glue and these held very well! They are well made and not flimsy like other sets I’ve had but they’re also not too thick. 10/10 would recommend. Review Title: Very great set Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Ivnil Nose Strips For Blackheads Remover, Nose Pore Strips, With Instant Blackhead Removal and Pore Unclogging Absorb Dirt And Oil(2-Pack, 16 Counts)For All Skin Type Review Date: 2021/12/14 Store: Ivnil Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ivnil', 'Item Form': 'Strips', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '16.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.02 x 3.23 x 2.05 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '757158884746'} Review Text: I was supposed to receive watermelon but received orange which was very upsetting. Then to my surprise these strips do not remove the blackheads like they claim to. It left behind so many that it was annoying. It was easy to use but however they don’t work very well. Do not recommend. Review Title: Left too many behind Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: RBA’s Firming Serum to Reduce Fine Lines and Wrinkles - Improve Overall Tone With Yarrow, Neem, and Spirulina - Daily Vegan Serum - 1 fl oz Review Date: 2021/12/22 Store: Round Barn Apothecary Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrates, nourishes, and firms skin', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Scent': 'Yarrow / Spirulina', 'Brand': 'Round Barn Apothecary', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.6 x 0.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '019962727542'} Review Text: I love Round Barn products so much and this serum is another amazing product I love. It works so well to keep my skin hydrated especially here in Houston with the humidity. It does make my skin too oily or feel as if it’s weighed down. I 10/10 recommend. I haven’t noticed any firming yet but we will see. Review Title: Love this serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SKINESQUE Wake Up and Makeup Prep facial Sheet Mask antiaging detox moisturizing Nicinamicide essence korean skin care, 30 sheet masks per container Review Date: 2022/01/03 Store: SKINESQUE Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5 x 4.2 x 2.8 inches; 1.22 Pounds', 'UPC': '855501006224'} Review Text: These masks have been great! They’ve left my skin feeling nice and hydrated. At the end of the day, it helps me unwind and helps let the worries of my day go. They do take a little getting use to by getting them out and correctly placing them but overall I enjoy them. Review Title: Quick and easy Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Besame Cosmetics | Forever Red Lipstick - 1925 | Classic Color Lipstick | Vintage Makeup | Long Lasting Lipstick | Semi Matte Lipstick for Women | Moisturizing Lipstick for Sensitive Skin Review Date: 2022/01/31 Store: BESAME COSMETICS Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BESAME COSMETICS', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Semi Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Long Lasting,Nourishing,Clean,Moisturizing,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 1.14 x 1.06 inches; 0.74 Ounces'} Review Text: This color is absolutely beautiful!!!! It glides on so smoothly and I love that it matches vintage colors. I do not see myself using it often just because it is so expensive. I did think the tube was going to be etched with the design and not just some type of sticker design. Review Title: Beautiful ❤️ Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mented Cosmetics | Better Setter Setting Spray | Alcohol Free Makeup Setting Spray | Finishing Spray for Makeup with Vitamin C and Coconut Water | Hydrating Facial Spray | Vegan, Cruelty Free, Fragrance Free Makeup Review Date: 2022/02/21 Store: Mented Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '810502032719', 'Manufacturer': 'Mented'} Review Text: This setting spray is really nice but I don’t see myself using it over my preferred setting spray. For one, the price is way too high. That alone is the reason I wouldn’t replace my preferred setting spray. It does well at helping my makeup melt into my face. It does well at holding my makeup all day. Review Title: Nice setting spray Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6Pcs Silk Hair Scrunchies, 100% Mulberry Silk Hair Ties Cute Large Scrunchie For Thick Curly Hair No Crease Soft Elastic Hair Bands, Elastic Silk ponytail Holders Sleep and Night Scrunchie for Girls Women… Review Date: 2022/06/03 Store: Jconly Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Color': 'Green', 'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Jconly', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.63 x 1.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces'} Review Text: These hair ties are absolutely cheaply made. They smell atrocious and I will not be using them. They feel like something you’d buy at the dollar store. They feel cheap and don’t even feel tight enough. -10/10 Review Title: Super cheap Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

I really don’t like when I do my makeup and a little after start to feel oily. I use this and it refreshes my face and absorbs the oil. I decided to use the shorter set because at the time I needed my nails really short. I prepped my nails and used some glue and these held very well! They are well made and not flimsy like other sets I’ve had but they’re also not too thick. 10/10 would recommend. Review Title: Very great set Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Ivnil Nose Strips For Blackheads Remover, Nose Pore Strips, With Instant Blackhead Removal and Pore Unclogging Absorb Dirt And Oil(2-Pack, 16 Counts)For All Skin Type Review Date: 2021/12/14 Store: Ivnil Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ivnil', 'Item Form': 'Strips', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '16.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.02 x 3.23 x 2.05 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '757158884746'} Review Text: I was supposed to receive watermelon but received orange which was very upsetting. Then to my surprise these strips do not remove the blackheads like they claim to. It left behind so many that it was annoying. It was easy to use but however they don’t work very well. Do not recommend. Review Title: Left too many behind Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: RBA’s Firming Serum to Reduce Fine Lines and Wrinkles - Improve Overall Tone With Yarrow, Neem, and Spirulina - Daily Vegan Serum - 1 fl oz Review Date: 2021/12/22 Store: Round Barn Apothecary Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrates, nourishes, and firms skin', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Scent': 'Yarrow / Spirulina', 'Brand': 'Round Barn Apothecary', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.6 x 0.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '019962727542'} Review Text: I love Round Barn products so much and this serum is another amazing product I love. It works so well to keep my skin hydrated especially here in Houston with the humidity. It does make my skin too oily or feel as if it’s weighed down. I 10/10 recommend. I haven’t noticed any firming yet but we will see. Review Title: Love this serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SKINESQUE Wake Up and Makeup Prep facial Sheet Mask antiaging detox moisturizing Nicinamicide essence korean skin care, 30 sheet masks per container Review Date: 2022/01/03 Store: SKINESQUE Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5 x 4.2 x 2.8 inches; 1.22 Pounds', 'UPC': '855501006224'} Review Text: These masks have been great! They’ve left my skin feeling nice and hydrated. At the end of the day, it helps me unwind and helps let the worries of my day go. They do take a little getting use to by getting them out and correctly placing them but overall I enjoy them. Review Title: Quick and easy Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Besame Cosmetics | Forever Red Lipstick - 1925 | Classic Color Lipstick | Vintage Makeup | Long Lasting Lipstick | Semi Matte Lipstick for Women | Moisturizing Lipstick for Sensitive Skin Review Date: 2022/01/31 Store: BESAME COSMETICS Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BESAME COSMETICS', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Semi Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Long Lasting,Nourishing,Clean,Moisturizing,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 1.14 x 1.06 inches; 0.74 Ounces'} Review Text: This color is absolutely beautiful!!!! It glides on so smoothly and I love that it matches vintage colors. I do not see myself using it often just because it is so expensive. I did think the tube was going to be etched with the design and not just some type of sticker design. Review Title: Beautiful ❤️ Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mented Cosmetics | Better Setter Setting Spray | Alcohol Free Makeup Setting Spray | Finishing Spray for Makeup with Vitamin C and Coconut Water | Hydrating Facial Spray | Vegan, Cruelty Free, Fragrance Free Makeup Review Date: 2022/02/21 Store: Mented Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '810502032719', 'Manufacturer': 'Mented'} Review Text: This setting spray is really nice but I don’t see myself using it over my preferred setting spray. For one, the price is way too high. That alone is the reason I wouldn’t replace my preferred setting spray. It does well at helping my makeup melt into my face. It does well at holding my makeup all day. Review Title: Nice setting spray Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6Pcs Silk Hair Scrunchies, 100% Mulberry Silk Hair Ties Cute Large Scrunchie For Thick Curly Hair No Crease Soft Elastic Hair Bands, Elastic Silk ponytail Holders Sleep and Night Scrunchie for Girls Women… Review Date: 2022/06/03 Store: Jconly Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Color': 'Green', 'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Jconly', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.63 x 1.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces'} Review Text: These hair ties are absolutely cheaply made. They smell atrocious and I will not be using them. They feel like something you’d buy at the dollar store. They feel cheap and don’t even feel tight enough. -10/10 Review Title: Super cheap Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Preferences and Trends:**

1. **Beauty and Grooming:** 
   - High interest in manicure and nail art accessories, evidenced by multiple purchases in this category.
   - Engagement with makeup tools, particularly eyebrow and facial products, though experiences vary—some products receive praise while others are criticized.

2. **Fashion Accessories:**
   - Favorable attitude towards stylish hair accessories, especially unique and trendy hair clips, though quality perception varies between purchases.
   - Preference for items that offer a decorative touch while serving functional purposes.

3. **Travel Essentials:**
   - Seeks well-designed travel kits that integrate practicality and convenience, emphasizing value in compact and multifunctional items.

4. **Skin Care:**
   - Strong inclination towards hydrating and firming skincare products, with a consistent emphasis on natural ingredients. Generally supportive of brands that provide quality results.

5. **Mixed Product Experiences:**
   - High satisfaction levels with many purchases, but notable dissatisfaction with specific items, especially when they fail to meet performance expectations (e.g., skincare, beauty applicators).

6. **Gift Giving:** 
   - Consideration for gifts, implying a social aspect to shopping behavior, particularly with the mention of sharing products with family members.

Overall, the shopper values quality and aesthetics in beauty and fashion-related products, appreciates travel conveniences, and seeks effective skincare solutions, while showing a tendency for cautious return on investment.

target_interaction.title: Great for travel
target_interaction.text: This pocket sized comb from L’ANGE HAIR has been so great to have. I didn’t know it was going to come with its own carrying pouch ! I am so glad it did. This comb is perfect. I drop it in my purse and I always have it with me. It’s perfect because it’s flat and doesn’t take up much space. I can use it when I’m out which makes it so convenient. It’s also great for travel. I love when I need to take a weekend trip and I don’t want to take all of my fuller bigger combs. This will absolutely do its job!
target_interaction.title_meta: L’ANGE HAIR Pocket Size Comb | Blush Acetate | Compact Design for Travel | Easy Glide Mini Wide Tooth Comb
